imdb.plot outline: First Person is an exploration of gender identity and sexuality, covering LGBTQ-related issues through first-person narratives. With messages of tolerance and acceptance, the show aims to humanize issues that are so often underrepresented in the media or presented as political, moral or religious issues, detached from the people who are living them on a day-to-day basis.
imdb.title: First Person PBS
